backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing access-controlled user profiles and contact request handling with admin-only export and topic filtering.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/RUN-LOCAL-AND-DEPLOY-IC.md: Guide explaining how to run the site locally and deploy it to the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all page sections, navigation, footer, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Displays the series synopsis using content from the site config.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Admin dashboard for login, viewing and exporting contact requests, updating request status, and granting admin roles.
frontend/src/components/CharactersSectio: Renders character cards with metadata, optional images, and special-case logic disabling one character’s portrait.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation, mutation submission, error handling, and UI inputs for email, topic, and message.
Lists episodes from config and triggers episode selection plus scroll to video when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer with copyright, YouTube link, and Cash App donation tag.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, site title, CTA buttons, and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/IntroSection.tsx: Intro section showing an embedded or direct‑video intro, fallback link, tagline, and synopsis excerpt.
frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.t: Donation section displaying Cash App info and thank‑you message.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Reusable section header component displaying a title with an accent underline.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/VideoSection.tsx: Video player section that loads selected episodes or default video with error handling and fallback link.
frontend/src/components/WorldbuildingSec: Renders the worldbuilding section, displaying clans, clan eye rules, power system, rank system, and Shiranagi family info using data from animeSiteConfig.
frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts: Defines site configuration including title, media URLs, reward tiers, and extensive worldbuilding data for clans, powers, ranks, and characters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting, fetching, updating, and administering contact requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, fonts, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeIntroEmbedUr: Converts various video URLs into embeddable formats for YouTube or Vimeo, leaving direct video files unchanged.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a specified section with an adjustable offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about the project, including features, requests, and configuration state.
